data.actual_result: The infinite symbol is slightly off-cut on the right side
data.expected_result: Infinite symbol is not cut-off on the right like on higher Zoom Level settings
data.short_description: Infinite symbol in the server's Invites section is cut off on Zoom Levels below 150
data.steps_to_repro: - Generate an invite link that never expires - Go into the Invites section of the server you generated it from - Observe the infinite symbol being slightly cut-off on the right
